Package com.github.sebyplays.coloredconsole

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColoredConsole
    It's a wrapper for the System.out.println() method that allows you to print colored text to the console
    Colorizer
    It takes a string, and replaces all the keys in the colors map with their corresponding values
    DateUtil
    It gets the current date and time and returns it as a string
    SystemProperty
    If the operating system name contains the string "win", return WINDOWS, otherwise return OTHER
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SystemProperty.OperatingSystem
